articles.title: Hold the donuts: Dunkin' Donuts to temporarily close all Singapore outlets due to 'operational issues' - CNA
articles.description:

articles.title: Ovarian cancer: The two reflux symptoms that could signal the deadly disease - Daily Express
articles.description: OVARIAN cancer risk for women during their lifetime is one in 78, according to the American Cancer Society. Bloating and stomach discomfort are more common symptoms, but reflux symptoms may also be evident.
